Name: appalachian_pactmap13_tif1
Abstract: This map represents a georeferenced image of PACT Map 13 (1940).jpg prepared by David Dick, Roanoke Appalachian Trail Club.  It contains State Highways, US Route, Blue Ridge Parkway,  Appalachian Trail, Rail Roads, Old Roads, County Line, State Lines, and more in this Southern VA area.
FgdcText:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<metadata>
  <idinfo>
    <citation>
      <citeinfo>
        <origin>Potomac Appalachian Trail Club</origin>
        <pubdate>20191212</pubdate>
        <title>PACT Map 13 (1940), Southern VA</title>
        <geoform>georeferenced image</geoform>
      <ftname Sync="TRUE">appalachian_pactmap13_tif1</ftname>
</citeinfo>
    </citation>
    <descript>
      <abstract>This map represents a georeferenced image of PACT Map 13 (1940).jpg prepared by David Dick, Roanoke Appalachian Trail Club.  It contains State Highways, US Route, Blue Ridge Parkway,  Appalachian Trail, Rail Roads, Old Roads, County Line, State Lines, and more in this Southern VA area.</abstract>
      <purpose>The image was collected to digitize historical trail routes in this area to with a GIS project.   This may be used for research associated with tracing changes of trail routes.  </purpose>
    </descript>
